alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Franklin; Lauderdale; Lawrence; Limestone (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 13 at 4:21PM CDT until August 13 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN LIMESTONE...EASTERN LAUDERDALE...SOUTHERN COLBERT... FRANKLIN AND CENTRAL LAWRENCE COUNTIES... At 421 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Lexington to Town Creek to near Red Bay, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Athens, Russellville, Red Bay, Rogersville, Phil Campbell, Killen, Town Creek, Littleville, Lexington and Leighton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
